name: Remo+Voice
0:
”Alexa, ask remo plus for battery status.”
”Alexa, ask remo plus for last event details.”
”Alexa, ask remo plus for wifi status.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: remo plus
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Remo+ video doorbells and smart cameras are the easiest to install and features HD video, 2-way audio, advanced motion detection, night vision, and more. Remo+ allows you to keep an eye on your home and loved ones from wherever you are via the free Remo+ mobile app.

And now, you can ask Amazon Echo* to:

- Check your battery status
- Find out recent activities
- Get Wi-Fi network analysis

To get started, tap on the “Enable" button and follow the on-screen instructions to link your Alexa account with your Remo+ account.

Visit www.remoplus.co for more information.

Works with DoorCam and RemoBell only.

*For all other Amazon Alexa devices, please use "Remo+ Show" Skill instead.
